resources.string:
1. For initial setup, please press "Scan Devices" to search for 
		Activ5 device.
 2. Once the Activ5 device appears, select it and press
		 "Connect".
 3. Once you have a music player (such as Spotify) playing,
		 press the Activ5 to play and pause.
 4. Enter "Stamina Challenge" to explore more about Activ5
		 key functionality."
